## Description {#details}

Atomic pointer that&#39;s lock-free, but that can coordinate concurrent writes from a lazy generator.

Should be reserved for cases where concurrent uses of a generator for the same storage is unlikely.

The laziness comes in with <em><a href="#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396">loadOrGenerate()</a></em>, which lazily calls the provided generator ONLY when the value is currently <code>nullptr</code>. With concurrent calls, only one generator is called and the rest see that value.

Most other APIs treat an in-flight <em><a href="#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396">loadOrGenerate()</a></em> as if <code>nullptr</code> were stored. APIs that are required to write a value will spin.

The underlying storage is <em>std::atomic&lt;uintptr&#95;t&gt;</em>.

TODO: In C++20, use std::atomic&lt;T&gt;::wait() instead of spinning and call std::atomic&lt;T&gt;::notify&#95;all() in <em><a href="#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396">loadOrGenerate()</a></em>.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/lazyatomicpointer-h">LazyAtomicPointer.h</a>.

Compare-exchange.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/lazyatomicpointer-h/#l00100">100</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/lazyatomicpointer-h">LazyAtomicPointer.h</a>.

### loadOrGenerate() {#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>T &amp; llvm::LazyAtomicPointer&lt; T &gt;::loadOrGenerate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; T &#42;()&gt; Generator)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the current value, or call <code>Generator</code> to generate a value.

Guarantees that only one thread&#39;s <code>Generator</code> will run.


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>Generator</code> doesn&#39;t return <code>nullptr</code>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/lazyatomicpointer-h/#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/lazyatomicpointer-h">LazyAtomicPointer.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
